txt.en: 'Well met. If Gunvald sent you, then you have my trust as well.'
Scout Borghild is somewhere in north-west Elderslade.\n\nGunvald has asked you to bring orders to Borghild and lend what support you may.
Dwarf scouts who have pressed further towards the walls of Gundabad need support.
DNT - 'Well met, friend. If Gunvald sent you, then I can give you my trust as well.'

'You have done much to thin the ranks of the enemy, [placeholder]! Our scouts have thus been able to slip closer to the walls of Gundabad. If you are still able to help, bring this scroll to Scout Borghild, and lend her what help she may need.'
